body: Steven Youngblood says that the capita of Uganda, Kampala, is quiet after yesterday's elections. Meanwhile, President Museveni leads his rivals in early provisional results with 72% of the vote.
original_body: Steven Youngblood says that the capita of Uganda, Kampala, is quiet after yesterday's elections. Meanwhile, President Museveni leads his rivals in early provisional results with 72% of the vote.
title: Uganda: Kampala quiet after voting

sentence: Steven Youngblood says that the capita of Uganda, Kampala, is quiet after yesterday's elections.
Meanwhile, President Museveni leads his rivals in early provisional results with 72% of the vote.
